mapper.insert: insert into TBL_MEMBER (member_code, member_id, member_pw, member_kind, member_name, member_nick, member_tel, member_email, member_addr, member_image, member_date) values ( #{member_code}, #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_kind}, #{member_name} , #{member_nick}, #{member_tel}, #{member_email}, #{member_addr}, #{member_image}, #{member_date})
mapper.select: select * from TBL_MEMBER where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw}
